description:
Since the compute api now supporting sort_dir and sort_key [1], we may need to add this to the REST api.

[1]: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/compute/api.py#L1790
title: Missing sort_key and sort_dir for server list api

comments.content:
Since the compute api now supporting sort_dir and sort_key [1], we may need to add this to the REST api.

[1]: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/compute/api.py#L1790
